web.crawler

Class FileManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • web.crawler.FileManagement

  • public class FileManagement
extends java.lang.Object

      Constructors

      FileManagement() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void downloadFile(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String destinationPath)
      Download the zipped xml file from the National Vulnerability Database's website (https://nvd.nist.gov/) if the file doesn't exist in the working directory of the project.
      static void ParsingXML(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String destinationPath, DatabaseCreation database)
      Parse a xml file, which contain CVE to retrieve all the information and fill a database with all the retrieve information The structure of the CVE has to be the same as the structure you can find in the cve from https://nvd.nist.gov/
      static java.io.File StoreResultsInFile(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
      Store the result of one query on an xml file to be sent to a client
      static void unZipFile(java.lang.String zipFile, java.lang.String destinationPath)

    • Method Detail

      • downloadFile

        public static void downloadFile(java.lang.String filename,
                java.lang.String destinationPath)
                         throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Download the zipped xml file from the National Vulnerability Database's website (https://nvd.nist.gov/) if the file doesn't exist in the working directory of the project. After extracting the xml file delete the zipped one.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file on the website
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException

      • unZipFile

        public static void unZipFile(java.lang.String zipFile,
             java.lang.String destinationPath)

      • StoreResultsInFile

        public static java.io.File StoreResultsInFile(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                                       throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                                              javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Store the result of one query on an xml file to be sent to a client
        Parameters:
        rs - result of a sql query
        Returns:
        the xml file
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        java.io.IOException

      • ParsingXML

        public static void ParsingXML(java.lang.String filename,
              java.lang.String destinationPath,
              DatabaseCreation database)
        Parse a xml file, which contain CVE to retrieve all the information and fill a database with all the retrieve information The structure of the CVE has to be the same as the structure you can find in the cve from https://nvd.nist.gov/
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the xml file you want to parse
        database - database you want to fill with data from the file
